item.name: F19 to HYPER
item.autogen:
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19,
KeyCode::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: HYPER HJKL to arrows
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::CURSOR_UP

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT

item.name: HYPER Backspace to delete
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::DELETE | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE

item.name: HYPER w,q to vim save,quit
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::W | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::ESCAPE, KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::W, KeyCode::ENTER

KeyCode::ESCAPE, KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::ENTER

item.name: HYPER i,o to bash back,forward 1 word

KeyCode::ESCAPE, KeyCode::B

item.name: HYPER =,- to pageup, pagedown

KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, ModifierFlag::FN

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::MINUS | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, ModifierFlag::FN
